metadata.title: CVE-2022-48663 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:gpio: mockup: fix NULL pointer dereference when removing debugfsWe now remove the device's debugfs entries when unbinding the driver.This now causes a NULL-pointer dereference on module exit because theplatform devices are unregistered *after* the global debugfs directoryhas been recursively removed. Fix it by unregistering the devices first.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
